name: Super Duper Weapon Master The Game！
name_original: Super Duper Weapon Master The Game！
description:
Welcome to Super Duper Weapon Master the Game!

It is a rogue-lite turn-based story-telling super-duper crazy jam game, with far from delicated visual art and common-sense-violating gameplay! 

As the dragon-slaying hero, you will need to assebly as many weapons as you can - because ALL of those weapons are toooooo fragile. Every attack may break them and every powerful skill WILL break them! 

Wait, where is the dragon? You don't need to think about it, hero. Your level selection menu is designed to lead you to the top of the sacred mountain. You don't need to select your destination, since your journey is well designed.

- -

*System error*

It looks like some NPC is violating the world... Yes, he is using the fake name "Liber" and trying to reveal the secret of "the player", who has already abandoned this world for a thousand of years...
